description: Resource Type definition for AWS::RTBFabric::RequesterGateway Resource Type.

GatewayId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(rtbapp-[a-z0-9-]{1,25}|rtb-gw-[a-z0-9-]{1,25})$  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(?:[A-Za-z0-9](?:[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,61}[A-Za-z0-9])?)(?:\.(?:[A-Za-z0-9](?:[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,61}[A-Za-z0-9])?))+$  
Update requires: No interruption

RequesterGatewayStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PENDING_CREATION | ACTIVE | PENDING_DELETION | DELETED | ERROR | PENDING_UPDATE | ISOLATED | PENDING_ISOLATION | PENDING_RESTORATION  
Update requires: No interruption

Update requires: No interruption
